meta.note: Analysis adjusted for Gulfstream Park dynamics (Speed favoring Dirt, Inside/Speed on Turf) despite conflicting Track Intelligence provided for Saratoga.

selections.name: Blazing Bridgette
selections.reason: Top speed figure (103) in recent form and McPeek barn is heating up. Should handle the distance well.

selections.name: Eternal Mandate
selections.reason: Casse/Irad combination is lethal on GP turf. Look for significant improvement off the layoff.

selections.name: Resort (fr)
selections.reason: Pletcher/Gaffalione pairing respects the money; fits well here on class.

selections.name: Message Of Hope (ire)
selections.reason: D'Angelo/Irad team. Recent win and highest speed figure (111) in the field. Looks like the solo speed or presser in a paceless race.

selections.name: Change At Jamaica
selections.reason: Consistent speed figures (115) and Alvarado stays aboard. Drops into a winning spot.

selections.name: Captcha
selections.reason: Consistent underneath finisher, good for exotics.

selections.name: Volatiled
selections.reason: Graded stakes experience (Forward Gal). The class of the field dropping into AOC company. Irad Ortiz Jr picks up the mount.

selections.name: Awesome Beast
selections.reason: Beat Noble J last time out. Solid form cycle.

selections.name: Noble J
selections.reason: Honest runner, likely to hit the board again.

selections.name: Pike
selections.reason: Knocking on the door with three consecutive seconds. High speed figs (109). Velazquez/Abreu combo.

selections.name: Wall Street
selections.reason: Brad Cox/Irad Ortiz. Expensive purchase expected to improve drastically second time out.

selections.name: Maykomotion
selections.reason: Weaver/Gaffalione angle. Should improve off debut.

selections.name: Alpyland
selections.reason: Winner of the Dania Beach. Proven over this course and distance with a 115 speed fig.

selections.name: Turf Star
selections.reason: Graded stakes placed (Bourbon). Motion/Gaffalione is a strong turf team.

selections.name: Thousandsticks
selections.reason: Coming off a win with a huge 117 speed figure. Dangerous on the lead.

selections.name: High Limit Room
selections.reason: Back class and huge speed (119). Joseph/Gaffalione. The horse to beat.

selections.name: If Not For Luck
selections.reason: Won last out. Matches the top pick on speed figures (119). Irad aboard.

selections.name: Nero Tulip (gb)
selections.reason: Consistent closing sprinter.

selections.name: White Palomino
selections.reason: Massive class relief. Placed in the G1 Belmont Derby and G2 Pennine Ridge. Chad Brown/Gaffalione. Should dominate this AOC field.

selections.name: Dirand (ire)
selections.reason: Chad Brown 'B' horse but still formidable. Consistent speed figures.

selections.name: Without (ire)
selections.reason: Motion/Velazquez import. Watch the tote board.

selections.name: Solitude Dude
selections.reason: Undefeated 2-for-2. Fast speed figures (115). Irad/Joseph. Looks like a serious sprinter.

selections.name: Class President
selections.reason: Pletcher trainee who broke maiden impressively. Stretching out slightly should suit.

selections.name: Diciassette
selections.reason: G1 experience. Cutback in distance could wake him up.

selections.name: Mary's Lad (ire)
selections.reason: Consistent performer with high speed figures (117). Gaffalione fits well.

selections.name: Multiverse
selections.reason: Mott/Alvarado. Always in the mix. 2nd last out.

selections.name: Talbingo
selections.reason: Speed threat. Won 3 of last 4.

selections.name: On Time Girl
selections.reason: Cox/Irad. Won 3 of 4 including stakes at CD. Speed 108 fits perfectly here.

selections.name: Mythical
selections.reason: Local monster with 5 wins in 6 starts. G1 tested. Zayas knows her well.

selections.name: Sneaky Good
selections.reason: Undefeated. Cox second string but Gaffalione riding is a plus.

selections.name: Sister Troienne
selections.reason: Won the Ginger Brew over this course. 3-race win streak. Lynch barn is hot.

selections.name: Aggressive Lime
selections.reason: Brad Cox/Irad. Won allowance at CD. Speed 114 is competitive.

selections.name: Spirit Doll
selections.reason: Stakes winner at GP. Zayas/Joseph. Must respect.

selections.name: Cannoneer
selections.reason: Huge maiden winner (111 speed). Cox/Irad. The upside horse in the Holy Bull.

selections.name: Incredibolt
selections.reason: Grade 3 winner (Street Sense). Proven class and distance ability. Rail draw is tricky but Mott is excellent.

selections.name: Nearly
selections.reason: Pletcher/Velazquez. Undefeated. Speed figure 107. Will be forwardly placed.
